Subject: QuotaEnforcer

Hello,

I want to restrict the number of fetched documents per webserver. I 
am using the QuotaEnforcer prefetch procesor.
But I am unsure which directive should be configured, 
server-max-fetch-successes or host-max-fetch-successes ? Can anyone 
explain me the difference between them ?

thanks
   Thimo
